[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ hover_enabled=”0″ fb_built=”1″ _i=”0″ _address=”0″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” _i=”0″ _address=”0.0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” _i=”0″ _address=”0.0.0″ custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” _i=”0″ _address=”0.0.0.0″] [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_font_size=”36px” _i=”1″ _address=”0.0.0.1″]

FAQ

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”2″ _address=”0.0.0.2″][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What are the prices for your services?” open=”on” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”0.0.0.2.0″]

There are no fixed prices as we offer customized pest control plans for every customer. Our program is based on findings from a thorough inspection of your home and takes into account the magnitude of the infestation, your environment and your home. However, you can be certain that our prices are affordable. You can contact us for an inspection and assessment of your property, after which we’ll give a free quote.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”My current provider has been spraying my facility for a pest problem, but the bugs keep coming back. What’s the problem?” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”1″ _address=”0.0.0.2.1″ open=”off”]

Bed Begs are very notorious pests to eliminate from an environment. Most times, bed bugs are elusive and can only be gotten rid of using more than one method and technique. For this reason, you should work only with recognized and reputable pest control companies who use proven methods to exterminate bed bugs. All In One Pest Control uses the most up-to-date solutions and methods to combat bed bug problems.

.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Do you provide bed bug extermination service? If so, how much will it cost?” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”2″ _address=”0.0.0.2.2″ open=”off”]

Yes, we offer bed bug extermination service. However, a bug infestation problem is peculiar. Thus, we give customized plans that completely wipe out the bugs once and for all. You can contact us to discuss the pricing that suits you.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What can I expect during an All In One Pest Control Service visit?” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”3″ _address=”0.0.0.2.3″ open=”off”]

With All In One Pest Control, you can expect the highest level of professionalism. Our highly-trained experts will arrive at your property on schedule and begin work right away. Our service teams will ensure safe handling and application of the pest control materials.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What should I look for in a pest management provider?” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”4″ _address=”0.0.0.2.4″ open=”off”]

Although there are several pest control companies in Ontario, you should do your homework when choosing one. For starters, the pest control provider should be registered and certified by the necessary regulatory bodies. Also, the company should be reliable and must specialize in commercial or residential (or both) pest control. In addition to that, the company should be licensed and insured.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column _builder_version=”3.29.3″ type=”4_4″][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
